charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1101_0100:
While walking along a mountain road,
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard the ground
rumble, followed by the sound a scream.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1101_0200:
After heading in the direction of the sounds,
[EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found a group of Team Rocket grunts
on the verge of collapsing to the ground.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_0401_0600: Just a test of my strength.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_0402_0800:
I was just having a Pokémon battle with
my subordinates.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_0900:
This Nidoking has been by my side since my time
in Kanto, but...
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_1000:
here on Pasio, I have obtained a new power. The
power of Dynamax!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_1100:
However, there is still a great deal I do not know
about it. So I was conducting an experiment.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_1800: Nidoking can learn a wide range of moves...
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_1900:
His strength is in his ability to counter a variety of
Pokémon types and characteristics.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2000:
In terms of pure power, Mewtwo is superior.
But Nidoking is quite reliable as well.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2100:
This...is the power...of Giovanni
and Nidoking!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2200: Is there something you’d like to say?
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2300:
You seem concerned about my subordinates, but I
assure you, there’s no need for that.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2400: My goal is to use all Pokémon to rule the world...
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2500:
In order to achieve this shared goal, my
subordinates will happily lend me their strength.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2700: We are prepared to do your bidding at any time!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2800:
There is no higher honor than to be of use
to you, sir!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_2900:
Good work. This was an excellent test of
my strength.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3200: You look like you are in disbelief.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3300:
It may seem like I have no regard for
my subordinates...
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3400:
However, in reality, there is an undeniable sense
of trust between us.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3500: Just like the two of you.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3600: The power of connections...truly is fascinating.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3700:
Soon, I will unlock its mysteries. The power of
bonds and friendship will be mine.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_3800: Team Rocket will use this power to rule to world!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_0301_3900: Not if we can help it!
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_4300: If you want to stop us, you’ll have to face me.
charaepi_ch0140_10_sakaki/2301_1201_4400:
I look forward to the day we can have that
battle, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
